description:
Added in pike: https://review.openstack.org/#/c/463597/

That option doesn't show up here:

https://docs.openstack.org/nova/latest/configuration/sample-config.html

And, curiously, the compute_driver option shows up in both the [DEFAULT] and [compute] groups in the sample nova.conf.
title: consecutive_build_service_disable_threshold config option is not in sample nova.conf

comments.content:
Added in pike: https://review.openstack.org/#/c/463597/

That option doesn't show up here:

https://docs.openstack.org/nova/latest/configuration/sample-config.html

And, curiously, the compute_driver option shows up in both the [DEFAULT] and [compute] groups in the sample nova.conf.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: stable/pike
Review: https://review.openstack.org/497461
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/497460
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=64cb56c81a7309a667eea2ce85147e62d02cac91
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 64cb56c81a7309a667eea2ce85147e62d02cac91
Author: Dmitry Tantsur <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Aug 24 17:25:14 2017 +0200

    Fix sample configuration generation for compute-related options
    
    Currently the compute_opts are duplicated in both [DEFAULT] and [compute]
    sections, while compute_group_opts are missing at all.
    
    This patch does not affect where the options actually are, only where
    they are displayed in the sample configuration.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1712855
    
    Change-Id: I68f246998fd68e669b0d9ef34b00ed384f4f0c90
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

commit 96dcbdcbae0fa68076dea0b83c2baa17ae685b8b
Author: Dmitry Tantsur <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Aug 24 17:25:14 2017 +0200

    Fix sample configuration generation for compute-related options
    
    Currently the compute_opts are duplicated in both [DEFAULT] and [compute]
    sections, while compute_group_opts are missing at all.
    
    This patch does not affect where the options actually are, only where
    they are displayed in the sample configuration.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1712855
    
    Change-Id: I68f246998fd68e669b0d9ef34b00ed384f4f0c90
    (cherry picked from commit 64cb56c81a7309a667eea2ce85147e62d02cac91)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 16.0.0.0rc2 release candidate.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
